body:
Tor users may connect again, with a temporary caveat that we will not permit new account registration via the Tor network. [Users connecting via Tor will be prompted to connect normally to sign up](https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/606107279003222036/747290997360164904/unknown.png). Once registered, users may sign into Ruqqus via Tor and participate as normal.

Tor is an important tool to evade third-party censorship. Unfortunately it also presents a too-convenient tool for abuse.

Earlier today, about six thousand fake accounts were registered using Tor connections to evade blocks. These have all been dealt with, but obviously we want to prevent a recurrence. As a quick solution to this, [we banned all Tor connections](https://ruqqus.com/post/2jed/due-to-abuse-we-are-for). Now, we are scaling that back to blocking only the new account registration functions.

We appreciate the unfortunate need for tools like Tor in today's censorious world. We eventually want to make finer tuned anti abuse features, to allow Tor users to access as much of Ruqqus as possible, without turning Ruqqus into a doormat for digital attacks.

Thank you for your patience as we grow and promote freedom together.

Edit: [Tor visitors can register accounts again.](https://ruqqus.com/post/2kfw/tor-and-new-accounts)

post.body:
Tor users may connect again, with a temporary caveat that we will not permit new account registration via the Tor network. [Users connecting via Tor will be prompted to connect normally to sign up](https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/606107279003222036/747290997360164904/unknown.png). Once registered, users may sign into Ruqqus via Tor and participate as normal.

Tor is an important tool to evade third-party censorship. Unfortunately it also presents a too-convenient tool for abuse.

Earlier today, about six thousand fake accounts were registered using Tor connections to evade blocks. These have all been dealt with, but obviously we want to prevent a recurrence. As a quick solution to this, [we banned all Tor connections](https://ruqqus.com/post/2jed/due-to-abuse-we-are-for). Now, we are scaling that back to blocking only the new account registration functions.

We appreciate the unfortunate need for tools like Tor in today's censorious world. We eventually want to make finer tuned anti abuse features, to allow Tor users to access as much of Ruqqus as possible, without turning Ruqqus into a doormat for digital attacks.

Thank you for your patience as we grow and promote freedom together.

Edit: [Tor visitors can register accounts again.](https://ruqqus.com/post/2kfw/tor-and-new-accounts)

Edit: Tor visitors can register accounts again.

body:
The purpose of Tor is to evade third-party (I.e: government) censorship. 

Unfortunately the features that let it do that also let Tor be easily used in an abusive manner too. 

We definitely want to support censorship evasion but we can't do that if we are getting wrecked by cyberattacks.

post.body:
Tor users may connect again, with a temporary caveat that we will not permit new account registration via the Tor network. [Users connecting via Tor will be prompted to connect normally to sign up](https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/606107279003222036/747290997360164904/unknown.png). Once registered, users may sign into Ruqqus via Tor and participate as normal.

Tor is an important tool to evade third-party censorship. Unfortunately it also presents a too-convenient tool for abuse.

Earlier today, about six thousand fake accounts were registered using Tor connections to evade blocks. These have all been dealt with, but obviously we want to prevent a recurrence. As a quick solution to this, [we banned all Tor connections](https://ruqqus.com/post/2jed/due-to-abuse-we-are-for). Now, we are scaling that back to blocking only the new account registration functions.

We appreciate the unfortunate need for tools like Tor in today's censorious world. We eventually want to make finer tuned anti abuse features, to allow Tor users to access as much of Ruqqus as possible, without turning Ruqqus into a doormat for digital attacks.

Thank you for your patience as we grow and promote freedom together.

Edit: [Tor visitors can register accounts again.](https://ruqqus.com/post/2kfw/tor-and-new-accounts)
